titleStmt.title: The Dvtch vsurpation, or, A brief view of the behaviours of the States-General of the United Provinces, towards the kings of Great Britain with some of their cruelties and injustices exercised upon the subjects of the English nation; as also, a discovery of what arts they have used to arrive at their late grandeur, &c. / by William De Britaine.
titleStmt.author: De Britaine, William.

titleStmt.title: The Dvtch vsurpation, or, A brief view of the behaviours of the States-General of the United Provinces, towards the kings of Great Britain with some of their cruelties and injustices exercised upon the subjects of the English nation; as also, a discovery of what arts they have used to arrive at their late grandeur, &c. / by William De Britaine.
titleStmt.author: De Britaine, William.

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of originals in: Huntington Library (reel 484:12) and Corpus Christi College (University of Oxford). Library (reel 2974:7)..
